mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.nickname, m.my_team_code AS teamCode FROM locker_posts p JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO locker_posts (member_id, category, title, content, image_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE locker_posts SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId}
